entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:50 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Partly cloudy late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
